job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
This position is part of a team that focuses on the development of vehicle related embedded, backend, and frontend software systems with particular relevance to the US and Canadian markets and will work alongside development and infrastructure teams to research, design, deliver, automate and operate the platform to host online services on the basis of Microsoft Azure and MCVP
As a Senior Site Reliability Engineer specializing in Software Engineering, your aim will be to focus on software engineering excellence and applied SRE principles. You will have the opportunity to help us build tooling to help grow and operate our global hyper-scale operations. You may also embed with an application development team where you will help develop next generation features for the automotive cloud and help your team apply SRE-driven patterns, practices, and solutions. In driving these best practices, you will help us drive consistency and increase maturity across our teams. Additionally, you will help facilitate the on-call and service review processes for your application team. By accomplishing these things, you will play an exceptionally critical role in ensuring that millions of customers around the world can rely on the features your team and our organization produce.
Role Responsibilities:
Conception, definition, and integration of online services E2E
Collection of requirements, plausibility, and risk analysis
Collaboration with other functional owners and stakeholders
Manage the specification, development, and integration of API requirements between backend systems (e.g. SOAP, REST, HTML, MQTT)
Issue analysis and lifecycle management
Risk management
Planning of online services lifecycles, including post-SOP support
Contribute to the management of variant, quality, and change management
Integration of service packages in vehicle projects and securing the deployment in production environment
Interaction with local and remote suppliers
Synchronization of US development activities with internal and external stakeholders
Reporting of status and progress to internal and external stakeholders
Utilize latest technology and deliver services with availability
Remote global customer care
Assure smooth operation of services
Analyze and fix faults, debug code, create bug reports and define feature requests
Provide information and training for 1st and 2nd level support
Required Experience:
5-8 years of experience working with development teams, preferably in supporting cloud and managed services
Required Education:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent
Desired Education:
MBA or other Master's Degree
Certification in Project Management field
Certification(s) Preferred: PMI, SCPO
Required Skills:
Proven ability to take business/marketing concepts or user stories and translate them to detailed engineering specifications
Defines and tracks work packages for function related components
Systems/software engineering background
Relevant experience working with end-to-end/cloud-based teams and their applications
System-level thinking
Requirements analysis, definition, and implementation
Experience working on projects involving integration of E2E Systems: vehicle, backend, and frontend
Understanding of continuous integration and deployment practices
Solid teamwork and interpersonal skills
High service orientation and motivation to build up new services
Excellent understanding of microservices
Change management experience
Issue and risk management
Prior experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment
Excellent oral and written communication skills
Excellent interpersonal and organizational skills
Motivated team player, with positive attitude and strong work ethic
Demonstrated competency in designing, programming, testing and maintaining complex data platforms and components
Appreciation of security, reliability, scalability and availability requirements
Excellent verbal and written communication skills, including the ability to explain IT concepts and technologies to other team members.
Risk and Issue Management
Ability to analyze and think quickly and to resolve conflict
Ability to adapt to a changing environment
Self-motivation and ability to stay focused amid distraction
Ability to work in fast-paced environments and adapt quickly
Desired Skills:
Experience working in diverse and international environments
Hands-on embedded and integrated automotive systems experience
Understanding of common backend API technologies
Passion for cars and car electronics
Work Flexibility:
Travel is estimated to be 10-15%
We are proud to be an EEO employer M/F/D/V. We maintain a drug-free workplace and perform pre-employment substance abuse testing.
